titleStmt.title: Orders and rules agreed upon by the syndics for the better securing the publick library. June 20. 1684
Orders
titleStmt.author: University of Cambridge.

notesStmt.note: Above caption title: I Christopher Duke of Albemarle, [...] cellour of the University of Cambridge, having perused these following orders and rules, (for the more effectual securing of the publick library there) ... . New-hall, June 26. 1684. Albemarle.
Place of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
